name: Full Report of Complaints
query:
SELECT
    -- Total new patients
    (SELECT COUNT(*) 
     FROM `tabQue`
     WHERE date BETWEEN %(from)s AND %(to)s
       AND que_type = 'New Patient'
    ) AS "Total New Patients",
    
    -- Total complaints
    (SELECT COUNT(*)
     FROM `tabPatients Complaint`
     WHERE solved = 'No'
    ) AS "Total Complaints",
    
    -- Total solved complaints
    (SELECT COUNT(*)
     FROM `tabPatients Complaint`
     WHERE solved = 'Yes'
    ) AS "Total Solved Complaints",
    
    -- Remaining complaints (unsolved minus solved)
    ( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `tabPatients Complaint` WHERE solved = 'No') -
      (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `tabPatients Complaint` WHERE solved = 'Yes') 
    ) AS "Remaining Complaints",
    
    -- New patients who had no complaints
    ( (SELECT COUNT(*) 
       FROM `tabQue` 
       WHERE date BETWEEN %(from)s AND %(to)s
         AND que_type = 'New Patient') 
      - 
      (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `tabPatients Complaint`)
    ) AS "No Complaints Patients"
